title: Retro poster font similar to Indochine NF
content:
Hi guys,

looking for a font very similar to Indochine NF, however with a line in every glyph, and slightly less bold if i remember right. Especially the S should ring a bell.

A preview of Indochine below

thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804171252im_/http:/typophile.com/files/INDOCHINE_5160.jpg)
author: mike.j

comments.content: if you search myfonts for [Broadway](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804171252/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/broadway/fonts) you can get some that may be what you are looking for.
Thanks for the tip, however didn't turn up an exact match or anything with a similar S :(
sorry. without a visual it's hard to provide any other feedback.

I found the perfect example! It seems like a match for indochine NF, if you squash it...

here it is:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804171252im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_allespasseert1_4160.jpg)
